data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Chelyabinsk, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chelyabinsk, Russia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Chelyabinsk. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next hour in Chelyabinsk, Russia.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Chelyabinsk, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Chelyabinsk, Russia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Altai people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Altai people.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Chelyabinsk do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 3,476,200 people living in Chelyabinsk through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Chelyabinsk. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

location.name: Chelyabinsk
location.people_groups_list: Nanai, Hezhen, Aleut, Eastern, Yukagir, Yazidi, Aghul
